```{r}

library(simmer)
library(plyr)
  
  
  Boing=3
  ceewu=3
  yisan=2
  
  
  #1-9-6-11
  route1 <- trajectory("1-9-6-11") %>%
    batch(yisan,permanent=FALSE,name="1-9")%>%
    seize("c-130a", amount=1) %>% #bragg to batimore uses c-130
    timeout(4.5)%>% #bragg to batimore takes 9 hours back and forth
    clone(n=2,
          trajectory("original")%>%
            timeout(4.5)%>% #round trip c-130 home
            release("c-130a",amount=1)%>%
            separate(),
          trajectory("forward")%>%
            separate()%>%
            batch(Boing,permanent=FALSE,name="9-6")%>%
            seize("Boeing 777a",amount=1)%>%
            timeout(8.5)%>% #round trip c-130 home
            clone(n=2,
                  trajectory("original")%>%
                    timeout(8.5)%>%
                    release("Boeing 777a",amount=1)%>%
                    separate(),
                  trajectory("forward")%>%
                    separate()%>%
                    batch(ceewu,permanent=FALSE,name="6-11")%>%
                    seize("c-5a",amount=1)%>%
                    timeout(15)%>%
                    release("c-5a",amount=1)%>%
                    separate()
          
          )%>%
          synchronize(wait = FALSE))

  for (i in 1: length(platonmonotr1)){

    t_data<-t_data[-c(1:154),]

    s2_data<-aggregate(t_data$end_time~t_data$name,FUN="max")
```
